name: HAUNTED: Halloween '86 (The Curse Of Possum Hollow)
description: A brand new NES homebrew game independently developed by Retrotainment Games and released on an NES cartridge. This classic style beat 'em up / platformer adheres to all NES hardware restrictions and pushes the limits of game play on the console. '86 takes you in and around the town of Possum Hollow on Halloween in 1986.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 2.0 GHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: nVIDIA GeForce GT 525M Storage: 200 MB available space
